description: This file defines routing for project-related API endpoints in an Express application, mapping HTTP methods to controller functions.

methods.name: router.get("/:id")
methods.description: Route for getting a project by ID

methods.name: router.post("/")
methods.description: Route for creating a new project

methods.name: router.put("/:id")
methods.description: Route for updating a project by ID

methods.name: router.delete("/:id")
methods.description: Route for deleting a project by ID
